mapper.select: select no as id, project_name as projectName, start_date as start, end_date as end, descrition as description, status from project where crew_no= #{crewNo};
mapper.update: update project set project_name=#{projectName}, start_date=#{start}, end_date=#{end}, descrition=#{description}, status=#{status},crew_no=#{crewNo} where no=#{id};
